column1: I<s>n what month in [YEAR FROM BL08a or BL08b] did you first smoke part or all of a cigar with marijuana in it?</s>

column2: Len : 2    MONTH OF FIRST USE OF CIGAR W/MJ IN IT - RECODE
OTE: When respondents previously reported using marijuana but reported less recent use of marijuana than they reported for blunts, a consistency
check was triggered only when respondents reported using blunts in the past 30 days. Therefore, BLNTREC was assigned a code of 12 when
respondents reported last using marijuana more than 12 months ago but reported using blunts more than 30 days ago but within the past 12 months.

column1: H<s>ow long has it been since you last smoked part or all of a cigar with marijuana in it?</s>

column2: Len : 2    TIME SINCE LAST SMOKED CIGAR WITH MJ IN IT
OTE: BLRECFL2 has nonblank values when data on initiation of use from BLNTAGE, BLNTYFU, or BLNTMFU indicate more recent use of
Len : 2    INCONSISTENCY BETW BLNTREC AND INCIDENCE DATA
